name: Golf Solitaire Club
description:
Come on down onto the sunny green and join the Golf Solitaire Club! With mindfully coloured cards and a soothing background, relaxation is paramount, so take your time and clear the green of cards.
Based on the classic Golf Solitaire game, it’s easy to learn if you’ve never played before. Simply play cards from the layout with one value higher or lower on the open card beneath. Our tutorial and intuitive touch controls will have you making brilliant card runs in less than a minute! There are handy jokers on which to lay any card if you get stuck and a nifty undo button to rectify errors. There are no sand traps here, just play your way!

With clear-cut graphics and slick gameplay, each game is pure and simple enjoyment. Test your tactics and keep an eye on how your score progresses with each passing round. With easily accessible scoreboards and an end-of-round summary, you can witness your solitaire skills going from strength to strength.

Top Features:
- A picturesque, calming background and muted colours, tailor-made to soothe and relax.
- Rules that are similar to Tri Peaks Solitaire, popular because it’s so quick to learn how to play!
- No drag and place, just tap away to play!
- Jokers to ensure a game which isn’t too tough
- Multiple ways to earn points and bonuses, summarised after each round.
- In-depth instructions with a thoughtful tutorial to help you become the King or Queen of cards!

If you’re going to join a club, let it be the Golf Solitaire Club!
